sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
in a random way
, se pri opravilu ne ravnamo po nikakršnem načrtu ali sistemu.

seg.quote: The way the books were arranged seemed completely random.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
at random
, se pri opravilu ne ravnamo po nikakršnem načrtu ali sistemu.

seg.quote: He opened the book at random.
I let my thoughts come at random.
